node.text_zh:
政府宣佈

★ 以下社交距離措施將由本週五開始實施

➦ 由晚上6時後，全面禁止堂食

➦ 每檯人數上限減至B類2人、C類4、D類6人

➦ 關閉處所：健身中心、遊戲機中心、浴室、遊樂場所（主題公園、博物館）、公眾場所、美容院、郵輪，及所有康文署場地；

➦ 暫停郵輪本地遊及公海遊

➦ 醫院及院舍要暫停探訪
node.text_en:
Government announcements

★ The following social distancing measures will be in effect on Friday, Jan 7, 2022:

➦ No dine-in services can be provided after 6 pm.

➦ The maximum pax count for each catering business category will decrease by 2. (2pax for Cat. B, 4pax for Cat. C, 6pax for Cat. D)

➦ Closed premises: fitness centres, sports premises, beauty salons, massage parlors, game centres, playgrounds, public entertainment venues, karaoke venues, mahjong tin kau premises, swimming pools, bar and pubs, bath-houses, clubs, nightclubs, and party rooms. All LCSD-managed venues will be closed.

➦ Local tours and "Cruise-to-nowhere" itineraries will be suspended.

➦ No visitors will be permitted at hospital wards and nursing homes.

node.text_zh:
受規管業務及處所 (詳情)

處所負責人須為其員工安排每 14 日進行一次檢測及要求顧客進入處所前使用「安心出行」應用程式記錄行蹤或登記個人資料。            公眾及私人泳池可在遵守一系列感染控制措施後可重新開放。            戲院、表演場地及兩個主題公園的入場人數上限，提升至該處所容納量的75%。            宗教活動參與人數不可多於場地可容納人數的三成，而在活動進行期間不得飲食。            符合疫苗氣泡規定的酒吧或酒館、浴室、派對房間、夜店或夜總會、卡拉OK場所及麻將天九耍樂處所可重新開業。
node.text_en:
Businesses and premises under regulations (Details)

Persons responsible for catering business premises and specific premises are required to arrange testing for their employees every 14 days, and require that their customers track their visits using the 'Leave Home Safe' app, or register their personal contact information.            Public and private swimming pools can be reopened on condition of compliance to a series of infection control measures.             The maximum number of admissions for theatres, performance venues, and the two theme parks have been increased to 75% of respective premise capacity.             The number of participants in religious activities should not exceed 30% of venue capacity, and no food or drink is allowed during the activities.            bars or pubs, clubs or nightclubs, bathhouses, party rooms, karaoke establishments and mahjong-tin kau premises can resume operation if they can fulfil the requirements under the "vaccine bubble"
